room_title: Escape room "Maniac" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We did the Maniac escape room and honestly had the best time. It was creepy and creative and kept us working together as a team. I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Maniac" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: My husband and I went with my brother in law and future sister in law. We had an awesome time! We did Questburgh's newest escape room "Maniac". It was a very fun and, at times, terrifying experience! The game masters were great! They made the experience a memorable one!
